website_summaries.verdict: A safe, large water trampoline that will keep kids entertained for hours.
pros: 1/2" foam padding around the perimeter for comfort and safety
36" high and an easy access ladder
cons: Can be difficult to inflate and keep properly inflated

customer_reviews.title: water fun
customer_reviews.text: hard to fill. had to buy extra nossel. filled put in lake and it went flat in 2 days. refilled, flat again. latter awful.huge job to take out and repackage to return. Amazon great and handled refund very well.
customer_reviews.author: divus

customer_reviews.title: We love it! It is a bouncer so you don’t ...
customer_reviews.text: We love it! It is a bouncer so you don’t get the air you would on a trampoline, but it is perfect for us. We are going to order the metal latter to replace the one it came with because the one it came with is a little tough for my youngest child. We are on it every nice day!
customer_reviews.author: monica

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for my buck
customer_reviews.text: Everything came as promised. Needed multiple (3) concrete blocks as anchors because we get lots of wave action on the lake during storms. Still dont know why the price was so much lower than other brands... but NOT COMPLAINING! So much fun!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaks air
customer_reviews.text: Filled with air, and found a hole near the ladder area. Now I need to find a way to package and ship back. Frustrating
customer_reviews.author: Anna Bonvallet

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. My teenagers use it in the small lake we live on for tanning and jumping. Holds several teenagers at a time and is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: brenda

customer_reviews.title: Kids are getting this for Christmas! Wish the box ...
customer_reviews.text: Kids are getting this for Christmas! Wish the box had a picture on it because we can't set it up as it's too large;) excited to get it on the lake this spring!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for kids. We use it at our RV area and keeps the kids having fun all day. I would recommend getting the aluminum ladder. it holds up better and easier to get on.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Burns

customer_reviews.title: Great water entertainment!
customer_reviews.text: We did purchase a stronger ladder to make it easier to get on. Kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: diane davis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Our friend has an island hopper water trampoline with springs and we love it. We needed something more portable and easier to set up, so we decided on the 17’ bounce n splash. Great decision! Blows up in 10 mins, ready to go. No assembly required. 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: We pull it onto on the back of our house ...
customer_reviews.text: We pull it on the back of our house boat and tow it around. People always ask where we got it. We've probably sold a few for Island Hopper. Our family recommends this 100%
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Goodman
